[Report Orders]

This is a restricted mission that must not be assigned to unauthorized persons.

If you have been assigned this mission, it was due to an error with the mission assignment system. You are hereby ordered to report through BTS (Battle Tactics System) without delay.

â€”Consul Dougal

It's good to see you, ! Thanks to battle-hardened allies like you, the world is still in one piece.

I ask you personally to keep up the good fight for the Valkyon Federation and world peace.
